docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Talmage, as Chaplain of the Thirteenth Regiment, N.G.S.N.Y., preached the annual sermon to that body of citizen-soldiery, in the Embury Memorial Methodist Church, Lewis Avenue and Decatur Street, Brooklyn, last night. "The Greatest Soldier of All Time" was the subject of Dr. Talmage's sermon, and his text was Joshua, 1., 5: "There shall not any man be able to stand before thee all the days of thy life."

headline.main: NONE COULD DEFEAT HIM; Joshua, the Greatest Soldier of All Time, Dr. Talmage's Subject. THIRTEENTH REGIMENT HIS AUDIENCE The Fall of Jericho and Ai and the Standing Still of the Sun and Moon at Gibeon. DR. ABBOTT ON NATURE'S LESSONS Mr. Blackburn Says Man Is to Blame for the Punishments Inflicted by God.
